title: 服务器崩溃，求帮忙看报错文件，vps内存是6g
author: Bestlove
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-14 21:12 编辑 

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// I blame Dinnerbone.
Time: 16-2-14 下午11:34
Description: Exception in server tick loop
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException

replies.author: Kbi_MC
replies.txt_content: 地图实体错误（检查是否有错误的物品/动物）

replies.author: Ameng_阿萌
replies.txt_content:
恩。。。初步看来像是地图的某些地方文件损坏了或者其他问题，总之就是地图的问题
报错这里给出了有问题的坐标，你可以把存档下载到自己电脑上单机看看这些地方有没有什么问题
另外找找map_server.txt 这个文件，应该是错误报告，可能会有一些信息
EntityPlayerMP['MC_qiujun'/603, l='world', x=-217.01, y=78.00, z=149.24](MC_qiujun at -217.01486753178176,78.0,149.24447260326022), EntityPlayerMP['shen_jun'/4042, l='world', x=27.63, y=64.00, z=345.73](shen_jun at 27.627766740048664,64.0,345.7311895269271), EntityPlayerMP['Evil_Black'/731, l='world', x=-215.50, y=78.00, z=149.30](Evil_Black at -215.5042657299035,78.0,149.30000001192093), EntityPlayerMP['mc_wrr'/4594, l='world', x=-404.55, y=65.00, z=-120.58](mc_wrr at -404.5475240263038,65.0,-120.57630849225923)]
